channel.title: How to put sprites in the game? or client?
channel.description:
Hello there! I have been in MoparScape for a while but I managed to register now, since the activation e-mail took 2 days to arrive. :/
Anyways. I have made some of my own sprites and I might want to edit some that are already ingame.(let's take RSCD v25 for an example).
1) Are the sprites of houses, items etc kept in server or client? 2) How to edit/add sprites in the game?
Waiting for your replies, Thanks in advance.

item.title: How to put sprites in the game? or client?
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

[quote=“Krypton, post:7, topic:221911”][quote author=infinative link=topic=291392.msg2348353#msg2348353 date=1216837911]

I’ll tell you how to for a nice sum of $49.99 including tax.

No thanks. Looking for someone else.
[/quote]
39.99 including tax here[/quote]
Let’s put it this way: I am not going to pay for people, who purpously charge any amount.

Or let’s then just say: free, if you can’t behave.

Read full topic

item.title: How to put sprites in the game? or client?
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

Thanks for replies.

I have sprite editors, but which are sprite files? Can anyone help abit with it? If it is needed, I might settle for couple of $-s. But it should work!

Got the same sprite editors, that are in RSCD v25…

Waiting for response.

Read full topic
